name: read utf-16 text file from application server
code:
DATA:  ${dataset} TYPE string,
      ${contents} TYPE xstring.
" open the utf-16 text file as a binary file for reading it and change the encoding
OPEN DATASET ${dataset} FOR INPUT IN BINARY MODE.
IF sy-subrc <> 0.
  " todo not found
ELSE.
  " read the contents at once
  READ DATASET ${dataset} INTO ${contents}.
  ${cursor} " 1. get snippet "code page" for converting ${contents} utf-16le (4103) or utf-16be (4102) into a text variable
  FREE ${contents}
  ${cursor} " 2. define what should be done here?
  CLOSE DATASET ${dataset}.
ENDIF.
